content.p: Welcome to Nottingham School of Economics (NSE) Malaysia! Established in 2010, NSE Malaysia is an integral part of The University of Nottinghamâ€™s School of Economics, a top ranked economics department. We provide students with all the benefits of a world-class British education but in the dynamic setting of Malaysia. As the world looks East, our students are in the unique position to witness first-hand the extraordinary economic development taking place in Malaysia and regionally within ASEAN. Our Economics degrees are among the few Bachelor of Science in Economics degrees offered in Malaysia. They combine the core analytical and quantitative techniques required by modern economics with in depth study of topical issues, informed by research active staff who are pushing forward the boundaries of the subject. Our academics are highly qualified with PhDs from renowned universities in US, Europe and Australia, and have extensive international teaching and working experiences. With rigorous training in data analysis, problem solving, report writing, oral presentations and teamwork, our graduates are highly sought after in the job market. Please take the time to explore our website, read about our research, take a look at our student experience and get a feel about what you can achieve on one of our courses. We look forward to helping you to achieve your ambitions at NSE Malaysia! Dr Teo Wing Leong Head of School of Economics University of Nottingham Malaysia telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8253 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8019
